all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And they were preachers of righteousness, and spake and prophesied, and called upon all men, everywhere, to repent; and faith was taught unto the children of men.
Moses 6:23
Quote of the Day
"If you sincerely prioritize studying the Book of Mormon prayerfully each day, you will find greater spiritual strength and confidence in the Lord."
Elder Ozani Farias | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
